title: MONDAY 1/18 - Conference championships are set
itunes:title: MONDAY 1/18 - Conference championships are set
description:
The conference championship games are all set after a wild Sunday. Tom Brady and the Buccaneers (0:12) able to avenge two losses to the Saints during the regular season to advance. But, the talk after the game was all about the future of Drew Brees (1:41) . Will he return next season? In the AFC divisional matchup (2:44) The Chiefs advancing to their third straight AFC Championship game, but lost Patrick Mahomes to a concussion. Head Coach Andy Reid talks about his team overcoming the loss of their star quarterback (3:06). In coaching news, the Chargers staying local as they find their new head coach (4:05)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
